name: chaiseblog
description: A simple CouchApp for blogging privately, built on [Angular.js](http://angularjs.org/) and [CouchDB](http://couchdb.apache.org/).

scripts.bundle: npm run browserify && npm run jade && npm run cssmin
scripts.mkdb: eval DIARY_URL=`json -f config.json 'db.url'`/`json -f config.json 'db.name'` && curl -X PUT $DIARY_URL
scripts.deploy: npm run mkdb; couchapp push app/index.js `cat COUCH_URL`/`cat DIARY_NAME`
scripts.start: npm run bundle && npm run deploy

author: Diana Thayer <me@dianathayer.org>
